column2: Located here is the new Government of a once powerful nation, striving to make great leaps with what little it has left.
We need time to work up the fervour in the populace for wars of expansion.
A nerf due to power of Asian accepted-pops.
A nerf due to power of Asian accepted-pops.
A nerf due to power of Asian accepted-pops.
A nerf due to power of Asian accepted-pops.
To compensate the global economy for the loss of roughly two thirds of China's population, RGO outpost is temporarily increased.
You have recently taken a decision to change a RGO, you must wait a while before doing so again.
The massive shipwrights of Venetia truly are a crowning jewel of Italia.

The federal nature of our state poses serious problems for maintaining order, with the various police forces underfunded by the local authorities, lacking proper training and squabbling over jurisdictions. The central government has proposed the creation of a Federal Force inspired by European methods, the Federal Gendarmerie which will be able to act over our whole territory as to severely hinder the rebellious elements of our population.
After this modifier runs down you will have access to a decision while at war to deploy the Solomon Virus.
Once considered legend, now revived and modified to be even more infectious & deadly, this weapon can wipe out entire countries once deployed.
You must wait till the modifier disappears before deploying The Solomon Virus again.
Efforts to only focus efforts on the integration of only a portion of our nation has lead to long-standing divison.
Focused efforts of cultural homogenization is proving fruitful.
This province is selected for manually triggered decisions such as the change Mining/Farming RGO.
